title: Microsoft 365 app: Tagging for commercial users in the Microsoft 365 app for web and desktop
description: Tagging in the Microsoft 365 and web and desktop apps is a new, intuitive way for commercial users to organize their work independent of where files are stored. Find the new 'Tags' feature in the 'My Content' section of the Microsoft 365 App. This feature is only available to users who have OneDrive provisioned.
